alert.note: Alert for South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 12 at 12:01PM PST until January 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one half of an inch. * WHERE...South Willamette Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel will be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
